Author: beezythegiraffe
Text: On the bright side, I can almost guarantee that all that weight you've gained is water weight and you haven't gained more than 2 lbs of anything else, *at most.* As for the rest of your trip, I'd recommend just getting the smallest portions you can and Cassie-ifying your plate (that's what I do whenever I have to eat in front of other people ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è)
